Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Thank you for visiting Astrum Solar at our booth during today’s event.
One of our solar experts will contact you within the next 48 hours to follow up on your request for a no obligation home solar site assessment. To get a jump start, gather your past 12 months of electricity usage (in kilowatt-hours) from your utility provider.
There has never been a better time to go solar. Astrum Solar offers cash purchase, monthly payment, and purchase financing options—we have an option to meet your specific needs. We hope to have the opportunity to help you go solar. Hear from our satisfied customers.
